title: EVRART ORB / communistquest
description: You get to attempt to smell Evrart and ask him about underground communism

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, *of course*. Now we're on the..."
dialogueTree.text: Yes, *of course*. Now we're on the right track...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "We're getting crates and pallets ca..."
links.text: We're getting crates and pallets calling to mind vast stands of winter pines, a swirl of ancient odours absorbed by heavy carpet fibres, but also a pervasive, treacly *sweetness* that somehow reminds you of kola nuts...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The whole place could probably use..."
links.text: The whole place could probably use a good deep cleaning, you think.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well? Smelling much *communism* ar..."
links.text: "Well? Smelling much *communism* around the Union boss's office?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a sharp si..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a sharp sideways look.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "Meanwhile, Evrart Claire clatters a..."
links.text: Meanwhile, Evrart Claire clatters away on his typewriter, wilfully indifferent to your presence.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "Meanwhile, the man behind the desk..."
links.text: Meanwhile, the man behind the desk clatters away on his typewriter, wilfully indifferent to your presence.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "... an office? Something officious?..."
links.text: ... an office? Something officious? Is that a word? There's a bit of dust in the air that may be triggering your allergies.

links.title: Rhetoric: "An important place. One of the last..."
links.text: An important place. One of the last bastions of the left in Martinaise. Perhaps here you'll find the man who'll help you get organised?

links.title: Rhetoric: "But you can't just come out and *as..."
links.text: But you can't just come out and *ask* him. You should make your introduction first. Pay homage. This is a man of *stature*.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "Meanwhile, the man of stature clatt..."
links.text: Meanwhile, the man of stature clatters away on his typewriter, wilfully indifferent to your presence.

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "Now *this* place seems promising fr..."
dialogueTree.text: Now *this* place seems promising from an ideological angle...
